data.message:
Biggest idol since I was probably 3 or 4 now I'm 18. Man- love you Slim Shady. You're still my biggest inspiration for music in general. Slim Shady, Eminem was the old initials (Bye-bye!)
Extortion, snorting, supporting abortion
Pathological liar, blowing shit out of proportion
The looniest, zaniest, spontaneous, sporadic
Impulsive thinker, compulsive drinker, addict. - these lyrics speak to me on levels you'll never know. Love you man. :).

replies.message: Pure, raw emotion. Not only the greatest rapper, but one of the great philosophers of our time.
